abstract: As long as movements to expand or strengthen conventional arm registers and counter-proliferation protocols lack traction or are thwarted, 107-millimeter rockets are likely to be fired at whoever tries to hold territory in Afghanistan.
snippet: As long as movements to expand or strengthen conventional arm registers and counter-proliferation protocols lack traction or are thwarted, 107-millimeter rockets are likely to be fired at whoever tries to hold territory in Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: Mosque Clocks and the Long War

headline.main: Mao's Rockets and the Eastern Afghan Border War, Part II
